name: gpt-copytree
description: GPT-CopyTree is a VSCode extension designed to make interacting with OpenAI's ChatGPT even easier. It provides a directory tree of your current workspace with selectable files and directories. You can conveniently copy the structure of the selected items and paste it directly into ChatGPT. Furthermore, it keeps your selection status updated even when file names or directories change within the workspace. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their interaction with ChatGPT.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
